lore: The claws of the Manticores are as hard as the first metals humans used to forge weapons. Nowadays, vervain is planted around towns and cities to keep these creatures away.\n\nThe Manticore Decimator prefers to attack at night, when the darkness can hide its presence. But what makes this creature especially dangerous is how it deals with its enemies. When it fights, it completely foregoes defense, biting and clawing at its enemies without caring about its own safety.
menagerieDialog: (These creatures were created to destroy humans; you should be careful while it's in the castle.)
(You've noticed the way it looks at you. Its homicidal instincts are barely contained by your bond.)
(It seems to be sizing up your other creatures, as if it's competing to see which is the strongest.)
(You'll never quite get used to this creature's tail, knowing that at any moment it could sink it deep into your heart and kill you in the blink of an eye.)
(It seems to grow restless any time you approach it. Perhaps you should try a different method of interacting with it.)
name: Manticore Decimator
